# This file was generated by gr_modtool, a tool from the GNU Radio framework
# This file is a part of gr-loraJam

#

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND loraJam_sources
    frameDetect_impl.cc
    jammer_impl.cc
    mux_impl.cc
    kiss_fft.c
    trigger_impl.cc
    payloadProcessing_impl.cc
     )

set(loraJam_sources "${loraJam_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT loraJam_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT loraJam_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-loraJam SHARED ${loraJam_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-loraJam gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-loraJam
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-loraJam PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_loraJam_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-loraJam PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-loraJam)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_loraJam_sources
qa_trigger.cc
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-loraJam)

if(NOT test_loraJam_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_loraJam_sources)

#     GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("loraJam_${qa_file}"
#         ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
#     )
# endforeach(qa_file)
